snippet: On Long Island, beer gardens in Franklin Square and Farmingdale, longtime German favorites, are being joined by new ones in Stony Brook and Smithtown.
abstract: Long Island fans of German beer gardens are welcoming a number of additions to their 'must visit' lists for Oktoberfest season (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: On Long Island, beer gardens in Franklin Square and Farmingdale, longtime German favorites, are being joined by new ones in Stony Brook and Smithtown.

headline.seo: As Oktoberfest Beckons, Feeling the Oompah of Long Island Beer Gardens
headline.main: Feeling the Oompah as Oktoberfest Beckons
headline.print_headline: Feeling the Oompah As Oktoberfest Beckons
